name: mr_pete
text: Man, Teodor in Panel 4 cuts Ray down at levels where a man should not be cut. Filmed properly, Ray would take two steps, then fountains of arterial spray as an orchestra plays a minor progression.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I dunno, I think it's about time Teodor or Beef took Ray down a peg while he was pulling that Layoff routine he keeps doing to them.

name: tellumo
text: aaron_haynes is right--we are talking about a dude who fired a guy without even making him a proper mix tape . That is low.

name: dougthehead
text:
and immediately after he marches over to the country club and cuts Ray down a few times, he proceeds to play a game of golf. Classic.

By the way, is he using Ray's clubs, or did he bring them with him so he could insult Ray and then play the back nine?

name: genequagmire
text: This comment is one of the best things I've ever read.

name: saint
text: the loafer is offended to hear Sharper Image when he is being talked about...Sharper Image is for geeks of the pocket-protecting kind.

name: catachresis
text: Note: Teodor busts out an interrobang

name: connellingus
text: Nah, an interrobang is a question mark and exclamation mark combined into one punctuation mark. Téodor just uses one after the other.

name: heccibiggs
text: H...how?

name: buttermoths
text:
Like so:
[IMGS OFF]

name: heccibiggs
text: Awesome.

name: atmus
text: I thought an Interrobang was a sexy new way of questioning a suspect :(

name: deusoma
text:
You are interrogating a suspect through rape. She does a :(
Response: Yeah, you can pretty much just ignore this one, you're already a rapist.

name: deusoma
text:
You are interrogating a suspect through rape. She does a :(
Response: Yeah, you can pretty much just ignore this one, you're already a rapist.

name: deusoma
text: Curse you, double post. Curse your black heart.

name: soticoto
text: Curse you, epilepsy. Curse your rapidly flashing heart.

name: zem
text: hilarious alt text: "These are some important fucking shoes!"

name: gouldgonewild
text: I wonder why the ultra conservative shoe is the left shoe?

name: soticoto
text: Cos the shoe is on the other foot now.

name: sargasm
text: Wait just a-- a shank goes off to the right!

name: thorfinn
text: Yes, that was definitely a hook, no doubt about it

name: ford
text: Out of curiosity, o these terms reverse when golfing left-handed?

name: gouldgonewild
text: Yes, I believe they are

name: gouldgonewild
text: It's more of an inside outside thing

name: lucid
text: Besides which, an actual shank is when you hit the ball with the end of the shaft of the club, rather than the actual face of the club. It can go in either direction.

name: fuzzyshoo
text:
It's when you hit the ball with the hosel.

If you hit right-handed and shank left, you are a witch.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Teodor is not very good at golf, but he is good at listening.

name: honesttom
text: Epic speech   talking shoe = good

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Not my favorite strip, but "does sharper image still comp your rides to the mall?" is a GREAT line.

name: baryonyx
text: I wish there was a strip intervening this one to the previous one in which Ray and Teodor both look up, and realize they are both at the same golf course on the phone, pretending to be somewhere else not golfing.

name: hateandwar
text: Is anybody else thrilled by how Ray goes into that epic declaration pose when Lazarus announces himself?

name: greenkoolayd
text: [[raises hand]]

name: mikebox
text: I love that while reading achewood we are not struck by the sheer ridiculousness of two enemy-twin-brother-talking-tassled-loafers

name: deusoma
text: As a wise man once said, "It is always better to be too ridiculous than not ridiculous enough."

name: tekende
text: Who said this

name: baryonyx
text: I believe it was Voltaire.

name: deusoma
text: It was in fact Tom Green, former shock comic.

name: edgy
text: Am I the only one who sees a face in the bushes on the left on the last three panels ? creepy face.

name: captain_arlo
text: I was going to say something.  It looks like some kind of eerie sheep-duck with a Norwegian troll face.  The body is the sheep-duck.

name: spectre
text: How did the shoes escape from Lucien in the Dreaming? More important, did Morpheus ever find out that when Lucien took the census, he "forgot" to list his own sons?

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Most of that was about the wrong comic.

Whoopsie!

name: joeldebunchastu
text: Ah yes, the beginning of one of the best arcs in the series.

name: lucobrazzi88
text: that facey looking bush is creeping me out.

name: plummet
text: rip micheal jaxin

name: sharktastic
text: ...and, that's what I get for trying to figure out how to make it display images in the comments so I don't keep seeing that (IMGS OFF) thing. Way to make a first post, Sharktastic.
